title: How to access Keycloak H2 Database
content: Keycloak stores its data in an embedded H2 database by default, which is a lightweight and easy-to-use database that ships in the the Keycloak distribution. In this article, we will discuss how to access the Keycloak H2 database and perform common tasks such as deleting an user. By the end of this article, you will ...  The post appeared first on .
